data.text: Rooms are spacious but furniture outdated and not maintaining Housekeeping and cleaning. No parking is available nearby . Located in very crowded and noisy area. Staff are not friendly nor professional
data.title: Not recommended

data.text:
this bad hotel 

Starting with no parking at all in a a very busy area so to get the room you need to park very very far , I walked for almost 3 KM to the hotel after I found public parking by hard difficulty 
(The hotel didn't mention this, no transparency) 

Second point , I booked single Queen bed and I paid different price for my comfort , but the are forcing me to accept 3 single beds saying this is the only available room ! What I shall do with three single beds ! ( single beds has lower prices in the booking.com and I didn't book that room because I don't want that room , why they force me to accept it 

I refused strongly , so the kept me waiting for long time 

Then they gave me same room of three beds joined 2 beds together!  Another lie 

And they are telling simply this is the only room that they have and I have to accept it !!!!!!!! non professional attitude! 

They are not professional at all , actually very horrible

And I don't advice and person to waste your money in this
data.title: Bad hotel dont waist your money

data.title: Mr

data.text:
This hotel is NOT clean and it is NOT properly sanitized, it is NOT safe for FAMILY especially with KIDS.

My friends and I were looking for a cheap hotel where we can stay together and work remotely. We decided to try this hotel because the rates were very cheap. However, it comes with a VERY bad experience. I wouldn't say anything bad about the reception, they were fine. BUT, the hotel amenities are HORRIBLE.

1. Rooms were NOT sanitized. The white linens were changed but the blue comforters were NEVER changed. We don't know when was the last time they changed that. They were too DIRTY. 
2. No sanitation for the restrooms
3. Poor cleaning routine
4. Poor wifi
5. No dial tone

How did we know? One of our friend staying with us, felt sick in the hotel and decided to go home. Since we will stay for 3 more days, we requested the hotel to clean the room... and the cleaner told us, he cant change the sheets, they dont change it. We again requested to apply detol to the cleaning material so that it will be sanitized, he said, go to reception, get sanitizer and thats it. 

If you want your room to be sanitized, meaning even detol, you have to pay EXTRA.
I thought it was MANDATORY for hotel rooms to be sanitized first because of COVID?

All in all, we check out and transferred to a different hotel. This is to give awareness to everyone who will check in. 

To the management, I know the price is very low, but it is your responsibility and priority to ensure that your visitors are SAFE. I hope you will improve this for future travelers.
data.title: Beware. NOT recommended.

data.text: The room was soooo big spacious fit for 3 persons and it's cleaned on a daily basis.Clean spotless towels, and bedsheets. And the staff are amazing. They just make sure you are always comfortable. The reception is clean too and their breakfast is worth the price.
data.title: Ms. Joy kumugonza
